info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 1:17PM PDT until September 02 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHEASTERN INYO, SAN BERNARDINO AND WEST CENTRAL CLARK COUNTIES... At 117 PM PDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sandy Valley. This includes the following streams and drainages... Keystone Wash, Lovell Wash, Potosi Wash and Bonanza Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
